name: Intergalactic Space Patrol
description:
This is the patrol of the starship ISP Venture our 5 minutes mission is to be an entertaining parody of science fiction and modern corporate control of EVERYTHING. Come and enjoy this space sim hybrid adventure game while we lambast the most ridiculous parts of the genre we love.

  • 22 Unique star systems to explore
  • 15 Explorable planetary environments 
  • 7 Game mode hybrid model
  • 52 Hilarious hidden achievements
  •  10 Playable ships in Instant Action Mode
  • 100+ Unique enemy starships
  • 15 Alien races to fight in FPS/TPS mode
  • Newtonian physics model
  • Mass Effect Style -Wink- Branching Storylines!
